thread.section_title: Stoneside Blinds & Shades Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Stoneside Blinds & Shades | www.stoneside.com
thread.title: Chris Robinson
thread.title_full: Stoneside Blinds & Shades reviewed by Chris Robinson

author: Chris Robinson
title: Chris Robinson
text: Kathy was a pleasure to work with from the beginning and I am very happy with the final product. I got four solar shade panels with an electronic motor for my south facing house in La Jolla. The style is modern and clean and the installation was punctual and the contractor very friendly. I would recommend Kathy and her company to others. Chris Robinson
